name: Firewatch Guerrilla Group
startIntroPart1: Hello, captain of the Foresters guerrilla organization, in order to fight the encroachment of the Ursus Empire, we need the help of powerful forces.
startIntroPart2: There is no need to be afraid of enemies in the shadows, these sinners will not be able to deceive your eyes no matter how they hide.
declaringWar: Detect the enemy and take immediate action.
attacked: Surrender, you have no chance of victory!
defeated: I don't want to see the raging fire of war anymore, let everything end.
introduction: Hello, I am the captain of the Casimir Forester Guerrilla Organization and look forward to cooperating with you
neutralHello: I'm on guard and there's no problem.
hateHello: This crossbow was made to judge sinners. One day, I will use it to lower the final verdict.
tradeRequest: It's almost winter, and supplies are tight. How long can we do this?
uniques: [+15]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>

name: Ursus Empire
startIntroPart1: Every country has people who call themselves defenders. There are so many things to be protected, and too many people who call themselves defenders. Most of these people are corrupt and incompetent, and we are superior to what we defend.
startIntroPart2: We are defending the future of the Usas Empire.
declaringWar: Where I am is the territory of the Ursus Empire
attacked: The Usas Empire is a derivative of my hands!
defeated: Did the soldiers of the empire receive the favor of the emperor for such a dignified thing? That's ridiculous!
introduction: I am the emperor of the Usas Empire and I hope you will follow the rules.
neutralHello: We come to you, will you back down?
hateHello: The crimes you committed and the secrets you control still burden you with many guilts.
tradeRequest: Usas's good deeds and evil deeds are equally important, and when you face our evil deeds, you must also face everything that our good deeds cultivate.

name: Adeptus Sprawiedliwi
startIntroPart2: The business federation ultimately didn't guess our purpose. Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has taken over supervision of Plot Zero, and the business federation will have to pay the price.
declaringWar: ...... Wuxuan Meng wants to hurt the children of the Linguang family? Huh, how are their reserves of forces?
attacked: ...... Presumably, the people on the board of directors are jumping their feet in anger now.
defeated: This road... Is it so long?
introduction: Hello, I am Russell, the Knight Commander of the Casimir Supervisory Council, and I look forward to cooperating with you
neutralHello: The place of the award is the belonging of the knights.
hateHello: ...... Casimir has no right to award me with honors.
tradeRequest: You still haven't changed your mind, have you?
uniques: +[15]% Strength if within [2] tiles of a [Command Center]

name: FOLLOWERS
startIntroPart1: Margaret Linguang, Knight of Casimir, Casimir's chivalry, should have been the savior of the suffering on this land, but now it has been completely reduced to a rotten legacy manipulated by Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce. There is no greater shame than that.
startIntroPart2: The so-called knight is the one who illuminates the entire earth, the sublime!
declaringWar: All harm is stopped by me!
defeated: Victory, defeat... It's just a moment of an infinite loop.
introduction: Hello, I am the Shining of the Apostles and look forward to working with you
neutralHello: ...... This silence reminds me of the years when I was in my hometown.
hateHello: ...? Why is the name mentioned... Sorry, I can't continue on this topic ...
tradeRequest: is supposed to be a symbol of glory, but once upon a time, it was already considered a commodity...
uniques: [-30]% Faith cost of generating Great Prophet equivalents

name: Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce
startIntroPart1: Dear Speaker, Lord Markowitz, I cordially invite you to dinner with members of the Board.
startIntroPart2: We still have a lot to settle since that damn Ranny Alliance betrayed the Business Federation, don't we?
declaringWar: Please be careful on the road.
attacked: Surrender, you have no chance of victory!
defeated: I still have... I still have a lot of chips... I didn't fail... You won't do it!
introduction: Hello, I am Markowitz, spokesperson of the Casimir Business Federation, and look forward to working with you
tradeRequest: My friend, it is my belief that this settlement can benefit both our peoples.

name: Armorless Union
startIntroPart1: Hats off to you, the great position of Xuantie without a league. The end of the knightly era cannot bypass the merits of the Invisible Alliance. You and your Knight Slayer terrify the Knight, but no one knows who you really are. Under your strategic planning, the alliance is no longer subject to business federations and will grow.
startIntroPart2: The mysterious Xuan Tie Great Position, now is the time to lead the rise of the Wuxuan Alliance. Can you stand the test of time and create a territory that belongs to the unarmed alliance?
attacked: The conditions are perfect, so that he is already a general!
introduction: Hello, I am the Grand Master of Casimir Wuxuan League, and I look forward to cooperating with you
hateHello: You have not perished, and this is my sincerity.
tradeRequest: This is a new collaborative project and we look forward to your response.
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to disembark

name: Knights Reddle Pine
startIntroPart1: This is the first time I have been promoted without advertising or flash. Head of the Red Pine Knights, Flame Tail Knights, Sona! I will continue to work hard in the future!
startIntroPart2: In the past, we regarded the Invisible Alliance and the Business Federation as the most evil enemies. But actually, haha, we are against the whole era
declaringWar: As far as you are concerned, is it worth my full effort?
defeated: Ahem... It's mine...... Is it wrong.....
introduction: Hello, I am the leader of the Red Pine Knights of the Knights of the Infected, Flametail, and I look forward to cooperating with you
neutralHello: Give, sorted out documents ... There was nothing wrong this time.
hateHello: Hmph, this is a knight nobleman, who is worthless, only knows how to bully the weak.
tradeRequest: This is Sona, Avona, and Ash, please bring me. Also, I chose this one. It's just a little bit of heart.
